sentences.en: A lot can be inferred from these statistics.
sentences.cn: 根据这些统计资料可以推断出很多事情。

sentences.en: Am I to infer ( from your remarks ) that you think I'm not telling the truth?
sentences.cn: ( 从你的话中 ) 看来你认为我没说实话?

sentences.en: Enough information is available to infer that membranes serve in coordination.
sentences.cn: 现有足够的资料表明,膜起着协调作用.

sentences.en: From the evidence, we can infer that the victim knew her killer.
sentences.cn: 根据证据我们可以推断出受害者认识凶手。

sentences.en: From the way he behaved I should infer that the man was drunk.
sentences.cn: 从他的举止我可以推断他醉了.

sentences.en: From this study we can reasonably infer that this behaviour is inherited.
sentences.cn: 根据这项研究我们可以合理地推断出这种行为是遗传的.

sentences.en: From your smile I infer that you're pleased.
sentences.cn: 从你的笑容,我断定你很高兴.

sentences.en: He can logically infer that if the battery is dead then the horn will not sound.
sentences.cn: 他可以符合逻辑地推测,如果蓄电池用完了,喇叭也就不会响了.

sentences.en: I infer that my proposal has been accepted.
sentences.cn: 我推测我的建议已被接受.

sentences.en: I inferred from what she said that you have not been well.
sentences.cn: 我从她的话里推断出你身体一直不大好。

sentences.en: Let us attempt to infer some useful generalizations as we go.
sentences.cn: 当我们这样作时,力图推断出某些有益的一般性结论.

sentences.en: People usually infer an unknown fact from a known fact.
sentences.cn: 人们通常从已知的事实中推断未知的事实.

sentences.en: Rate meters infer a readout from a continuous stream.
sentences.cn: 速率统量计是从连续不断的流注中推出指示数据.

sentences.en: Rather, we infer that planetary systems must be quite common.
sentences.cn: 相反, 我们的结论是行星系统的存在一定相当普遍.

sentences.en: The Court is reluctant to infer preemption merely from the presence of comprehensive federal regulations.
sentences.cn: 法院不愿意仅仅由于存在内容全面的联邦法规就从中推论出先占权.

sentences.en: We may infer that this process, continued during centuries, would improve and modify any breed.
sentences.cn: 我们可以推想,这个方法, 如果继续到数百年之久, 必定会使任何品种得到改良.

sentences.en: What am I to infer from your remarks?
sentences.cn: 你说的话究竟是什么意思 呢 ?

sentences.en: What do you infer from the voting figures?
sentences.cn: 你从选举数字中可以推出什么结论 呢 ?

words.tran_cn: 推理的；推论的；根据推理的

trans.tran_en: to form an opinion that something is probably true because of information that you have

trans.tran_cn: 推论， 推断； 猜想
trans.tran_en: to form an opinion that something is probably true because of information that you have
